name: Kittchen
description:
Made for the 3 hour game jam Trijam 109. Theme: Kitchen Time.

Some serious space-time issue happened. Screw the end of the world, your cat is trapped in an infinite loop and can't get to their food!!!

Fortunately, you have the power to change it.

While you cannot interfere with the kitchen to move things, you can manipulate the course of the events that already happened. Rearrange events on a timeline in a way that will help your cat get their treat!

Important: after a failure reset the cat to be able to rearrange events. 

CC0 Music by JuliusH from Pixabay, CC0 sounds from Freesound
